version_description:
+ German, Spanish, French.
+ Different colors for subjects on odd / even weeks.

+ Italian.
+ Portugese.
+ Today Widget.

Enabling the Today Widget

• On your iPhone or iPad, swipe right on the Lock screen to reveal Notification Center.
• At the bottom of Notification Center, tap Edit.
• Scroll down to find this app in the list of available apps.
• Tap the + button to add the widget.
• Tap Done.
The App became better and faster for your Schedule.

+ App icon upgraded.
+ Timetable export improved.
+ Some bugs fixed.

• App supports of Apple Watch.
• Lesson's number from 0 to 99.
• iPhone XR, XS, XS Max.

• Dark Mode
• iCloud synchronization
• Photo, video, audio, documents

+ Extensions for clock face on Apple Watch
+ Quick actions by long touch on app icon
+ Improvements of the Today widget

+ Non-repeating events
+ Countdown timer in Today widget
+ Appearance of the app has been improved

+ Full week on iPad
+ Landscape orientation on iPhone
+ Fast back to current date from the calendar
+ Today widget automatically switches to the next day

+ Landscape mode on iPhone 6-7-8 Plus
+ Bug fixes of the task management

+ Landscape mode on any iPhone
+ Fullscreen view for the task files
+ New widgets for the Apple Watch

+ Send a task with files
+ Send a schedule as Link
+ Send a schedule as PDF
+ Send a schedule via Email
+ Send a schedule via Message

• Improved an export of your schedule in PDF.
• Minor improvements.
• Bug fixes.

If you like this app, please write a review. It really helps and motivates us. Thanks.

+ Sending an any file from your task
+ End date for event with "Interval" repeat mode
+ Web-version of your schedule on any device
